description:
Domon and Rain are still training the Guyana Highlands. Rain is fixing the Shining Gundam while Domon continues his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erbitterter Kampf! Dragon Gundam gegen Bolt Gundam
Fierce Battle! Dragon Gundam vs. Bolt Gundam
Gekitou! Dragon Gundam Tai Bolt Gundam
Un combat acharné ! Dragon Gundam contre Bolt Gundam
激闘! ドラゴンガンダム対ボルトガンダム
